channel.title: Farm on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Farm on Game6r

item.title: Big Farm Link
item.description: While playing Garden Farm, you meet the owner of a small farm. More recently, the girl worked as a clerk in a huge corporation, but when she got out of town, she firmly decided to become a farmer. The beauty bought the abandoned farm and asks you for help. By controlling the movements of the heroine of the game about the garden and the farm, try to turn a ruined ruined economy into a successful enterprise.

item.title: Zombies and garden game
item.description: The Zombie Garden game takes you to a small farm that is under attack by nightmarish zombies that have escaped from a nearby graveyard. Unfortunately, you do not have firearms, and the only possible way to protect the farmer’s house is to plant predatory plants in the way of zombies that can destroy evil spirits. Try to fight off zombie attacks and protect the farm.
